author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Schluter LED niche framing tips…I add the bottom plate and top plate followed by vertical supports. But I make the top plate 1-1/2 inches taller than the niche’s height to accommodate the electrical housing on the back side. This is critical so that the niche will fit properly inside the wall. I love this LED lit niche because it adds more light inside the shower and makes it safer for users. Many thanks to @schlutersystems1  for sponsoring this video 🔥
title: Schluter LED Niche Framing Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor #schlutersystems #brandpartner
